column1: #Text=" One does n't just pop in on the Earth King ! "
#Text=" Katara says : " The king is having a party at the palace tonight for his pet bear .
#Text=" Aang says : " You mean , platypus bear ?
#Text=" Katara says : " No , it just says ' bear ' .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Certainly you mean his pet skunk bear .
#Text=" Toph says : " Or his armadillo bear .
#Text=" Toph says : " This place ... is weird .
#Text=" Katara says : " The palace will be packed .
#Text=We can sneak in with the crowd !
#Text=" Toph says : " Well , no offense to you simple country folk , but a real society crowd will spot you a mile away .
#Text=" Toph says : " I learned proper society behavior and chose to leave it .
#Text=And frankly , it 's a little too late .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aha , but you learned it !
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , I 'm mastering every element .
#Text=" Aang says : " Good evening , Mr. Sokka Water Tribe , Ms. Katara Water Tribe , Lord Momo of the Momo Dynasty .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Avatar Aang , how do you do ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Katara might be able to pull it off , but you two would be lucky to pass as busboys !
